nodes.text: Kagen Brendel was a male Human, who served the Galactic Republic during the time of the Jedi Civil War.

Brendel served the Republic as a soldier and attained the rank of Lieutenant. In 3957 BBY, Brendel was among a team of Republic agents who went on a mission to the planet Sernpidal, where they recovered a code cylinder that held the command codes for the sensor systems on Darth Revan's flagship. Afterwards, they traveled to the Republic ship Viscount and assisted the Jedi Bastila Shan in a mission to capture the Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Revan. During the mission, Brendel and the other agents encountered the Sith apprentice Darth Voren.
